file_content.text: My lord, I have updates from the other fronts.
I'm pleased to report that the Republic power station has been destroyed. Vette went through their traps like they were infant toys.
From her report, I doubt anyone else could have achieved it. You were right in assigning her to strike the power station.
She knew the consequences for failure.
She was properly motivated.
Knowing her capabilities better will aid me in future calculations.
I will reward her for a job well done.
Vette is to be commended.
When she puts her mind to it, she can be a very valuable asset.
I know what I'm doing, Quinn.
Of course I was.
That is abundantly clear.
With the base security systems down, you'll endure no automatic turret fire on our way to Faraire's command center.
And on the other front, Lieutenant Pierce was able to sabotage and lock the Republic spaceport force field controls.
Unfortunately, the news from the Republic spaceport is not as favorable....
Unfortunately, there has been some trouble at the power station.
Jaesa was unable to get past the traps and mines to reach the power station and detonate the generators.
Did Jaesa survive the assault?
Is she alright?
Yes, my lord. Thankfully, she escaped any serious damage.
Lieutenant Pierce couldn't find his way past the power station's traps and mines. I'm sorry to report that Faraire's command center still has power.
Failure is not acceptable.
I am very displeased.
I will accept responsibility, my lord. I should have known to suggest Vette for the assignment.
I should have assigned someone better trained for disarming traps and mines.
It's my fault.
I assume responsibility as well, my lord. In retrospect, I realize I should have advised that Vette be sent.
I think a part of you is pleased that the lieutenant failed.
Do you like this outcome?
On the contrary, my lord. I would never let personal feelings cloud my hopes for our victory.
This means the base's security systems will be operational as you invade. So, you'll be facing Faraire's elite guard as well as constant automated turret fire.
Fortunately, Lieutenant Pierce was able to sabotage and lock the force field in the Republic's spaceport.
I knew he was the man for the job.
Pierce was the right choice.
Yes, it seems under that insubordinate exterior lies a very capable soldier.
Pierce has proven himself up to every assignment.
He is a great soldier.
The credit is yours for identifying his strengths.
Admit it--a part of you was hoping Pierce would fail.
Does his success bother you?
I would never allow my personal feelings to color my hope for victory.
Now, when Faraire's reinforcements land inside the base, they'll be trapped behind the force field and unable to join the fight.
Still, the general's elite guard clogs the way to the command center. They are quite formidable.
What's worse, the spaceport strike has also met with failure.
Tell me what happened so I can punish whoever is responsible.
Who is to blame?
Did Jaesa manage to survive the assault?
Is my crew alright?
She lives, my lord.
Did Vette survive the assault?
Is my crew alright?
She is alive, my lord.
Don't you have any good news?
I'm not pleased.
The good news is I will be better able to assess your forces in the future.
Jaesa was unfamiliar with the Republic systems and couldn't sabotage the force field controls.
Vette was outmatched trying to hot-wire the Republic systems and sabotage the spaceport force field controls.
We should have realized that Pierce's familiarity with Republic systems here on Taris made him the logical choice.
I rely on you for military strategy, Captain. This falls on your shoulders.
I blame you.
Yes, my lord. I take full responsibility.
I should have known to assign Pierce.
That's my fault.
Luckily, we suffered no serious casualties.
We're not perfect. We all make miscalculations.
Relax, Quinn.
I will endeavor to prove that untrue in the future, my lord.
Now, with the spaceport force field still functioning normally, Faraire's reinforcements will be able to join him inside.
So, your route to the general will be that much more difficult.
It won't be a problem.
I have great faith in that.
And more enjoyable.
Then this may be the most fun you've had yet.
Not happy.
Hopefully that will be the last of it.
There's no time to lose, my lord. Faraire's command center awaits. Good luck.
Broonmark could not master the Republic systems and sabotage the spaceport force field.
Did Broonmark survive the assault?
Is my crew alright?
Broonmark escaped serious harm, my lord.
Broonmark failed to overcome the traps that protect the Republic power station. So, it still stands.
Did Broonmark survive the ordeal?
Was he killed?
Only his pride was wounded, my lord.
My lord, Darth Baras contacted the ship and ordered everyone here. He awaits on holo for your return.
